thread.title: David Ross To Play For Harlem Globetrotters
thread.title_full: David Ross To Play For Harlem Globetrotters

author: Sports – CBS Chicago
title: David Ross To Play For Harlem Globetrotters

organizations.name: harlem globetrotters david ross to play for harlem globetrotters

text:
David Ross To Play For Harlem Globetrotters February 23, 2017 8:02 AM David Ross. (Getty Images) 
(CBS) Former Cubs catcher David Ross is staying plenty busy in retirement. 
Since helping the Cubs to a World Series championship last season, Ross has agreed to return to the organization as a special assistant and also joined ESPN as a television analyst. Now, he has another endeavor to add to his list. 
Playing for the Harlem Globetrotters. 
Ross will play for the trick shot -making, high-comedy exhibition team on March 1 in Tallahassee, he said on Twitter. Coming out of retirement for the night! March 1 in Tallahassee. Come check out my new team @Globies pic.twitter.com/1bkf0zslWe
